text:
@SenSchumer be real. usa is #1 in the world in "total tests: 6,096,763".
our capacity is increasing. 
why invoke the dpa if we could accomplish the same thing w/o threat/intimidation against our businesses-partners in our fight against covid.
have some common sense
https://t.co/toYaSaGYMF
